meanings.definition: Remove clothing or covering from oneself or someone else.
meanings.sent1: She was stripping off her wet clothes after playing in the rain.
meanings.sent2: The actor was stripping down to change into his costume for the next scene.
meanings.sent3: As the superhero struggled to change into his costume, he ended up stripping in front of the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The artist was stripping away the layers of paint to reveal the original colors of the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The magician amazed the audience by stripping off his cloak to reveal a dove hidden inside.

meanings.definition: Remove the leaves or branches from a plant.
meanings.sent1: She was carefully stripping the leaves from the stem of the flower.
meanings.sent2: The gardener was stripping the dead leaves from the plant to help it grow better.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel was stripping the leaves off the tree to build its nest.
meanings.sent4: The wind was stripping the leaves from the trees, creating a colorful carpet on the ground.
meanings.sent5: The farmer was stripping the branches from the tree to prepare it for pruning.

meanings.definition: Remove the paint or varnish from a surface.
meanings.sent1: He was carefully stripping the old paint from the wooden chair.
meanings.sent2: The renovation crew was stripping the walls to prepare them for a fresh coat of paint.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child was stripping the paint off the fence with a stick.
meanings.sent4: The artist was stripping the varnish from the canvas to start a new painting.
meanings.sent5: The DIY enthusiast was stripping the old varnish from the table to refinish it.

meanings.definition: Remove the possessions or assets from someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The thief was caught stripping the valuables from the safe.
meanings.sent2: The company was accused of stripping the resources from the local community.
meanings.sent3: The naughty puppy was stripping the socks from the laundry basket.
meanings.sent4: The economic crisis was stripping the country of its financial stability.
meanings.sent5: The vandals were stripping the copper wiring from the abandoned building.
